lead_paragraph: The New York City Education Department recently told a group of parents and educators that it did not think their district was ready for a desegregation plan.
snippet: The New York City Education Department recently told a group of parents and educators that it did not think their district was ready for a desegregation plan....

headline.main: In Lower Manhattan, a Move to Integrate Some Schools Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Move to Integrate Some Schools  In Lower Manhattan Is Delayed
